Title: Gucci Pantheon 300m Automatic divers watch
ConditionDescription: Used gents watch in good cosmetic condtion but not fully working ....
Description: Gents stainless steel Gucci Pantheon 300m divers watch. In good overall condition, but not in full working condition. Genuine Gucci watch, though with no papers or box. ETA 2824-2 calibre, branded Gucci on the rotor. Sapphire crystal, uni-directional bezel, screw down crown ( broken though threads are fine ) Screw down case back. Fitted on its heavy OE bracelet The movement runs and appears to keep good time, but he crown has snapped off the stem. The date does not change over. The watch is being sold as spares or repairs only

ReturnPolicy.Description:
Please note returns are only accepted for items that are significantly not as described or that have arrived damaged in transit or not working. This does not apply to any item that is listed as, or states in the listing itself that it is broken, faulty, damaged, a project, spares or repairs, for parts etc. Nor any item that may have been tampered with or broken whilst in your possession I will not accept any returns on such items, unless you have, by my error, received a totally different item to the one listed.
No returns will be accepted on any item that specifically state no returns within the listing.
